name: Ninja Top Secret Run Jump Escape: Free Fun Casual Cool Kid Games for iPhone and iPad apps
name_original: Ninja Top Secret Run Jump Escape: Free Fun Casual Cool Kid Games for iPhone and iPad apps
description:
You are a ninja in training for a top secret mission. Run as far as you can and collect as many Chinese stars possible for your arsenal. Avoid the obstacles throughout the course of your run. Simple ninja touch controls. Awesome ninja action.

Get this game completely FREE today!
